## ExtractReplacements type

Extract replacement modules from an overridden module.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type ExtractReplacements<M> = M extends {
    __replacements: infer R;
} ? R extends readonly Module[] ? R[number] : never : never;
```
**References:** [Module](../module/)
